Ero Meruhen - Kin no Yubiwa (Ono) to Gin no Yubiwa (Ono) ~Shokushu na Bathroom~
Ero Meruhen - Kin no Yubiwa to Gin no Yubiwa - Shokushu na Bathroom
Erotic Fairy Tales: The Gold Axe and the Silver Axe ~Tentacle Bathroom~
えろ◆めるへん 金のオノと銀のオノ～触手なバスルーム～

description.en:
"I don't need this ring anyway!" She thought she saw the last of the promise ring from her ex-boyfriend until a water god came out of her bathtub and gave her 3 seconds to answer his question! Because of her sadness she lied to his second question so he takes it upon himself to purify her with his water; tentacle style! 

Part of the [url=https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=Erotic%20Fairy%20Tales]Erotic Fairy Tales[/url] series.
